original_text: And his fame went throughout all Syria: and they brought unto him all sick people that were taken with divers diseases and torments, and those which were possessed with devils, and those which were lunatick, and those that had the palsy; and he healed them.
korean_text: 그의 소문이 온 수리아에 퍼진지라 사람들이 모든 앓는 자 곧 각종 병에 걸려서 고통 당하는 자, 귀신 들린 자, 간질하는 자, 중풍병자들을 데려오니 그들을 고치시더라

sentences.original_text: And his fame went throughout all Syria
and they brought unto him all sick people
that were taken with divers diseases and torments
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 여러 가지 질병과 고통으로 앓고 있었고

sentences.original_text: and those which were possessed with devils
and those that had the palsy
